OkkeiPatcher.Changelog:
v1.14
- New: check for patch and app updates on start. If there will be an update of the patch you can apply only updated files by simply clicking PATCH (though most likely this will be... never I guess). When there will be an update of Okkei Patcher it will show changelog and allow you to install the update directly from a dialog.
- New: dialogs with data download size.
